nodes.text: Rey to the Rescue! is a canon Level 2 DK Readers title retelling the heroine Rey's journey through the events of the film Star Wars: The Force Awakens. It was written by Lisa Stock was published by DK Publishing on January 3, 2017.
The book was reissued as part of the Learn to Read with Star Wars: Leia Level 2 box set on December 12, 2017.

Meet Rey, the brave young heroine from the latest installment of the Star Wars™ saga: The Force Awakens™, in DK Readers L2: Star Wars: Rey to the Rescue! Takes a close look at Rey's home planet of Jakku, her fighting and piloting skills, her friends Finn and BB-8, and her evil enemy Kylo Ren in this new reader from DK.

Perfect for 5–7 year olds beginning to read fluently with support, Level 2 titles contain carefully selected photographic images to complement the text, providing strong visual clues to build vocabulary and confidence. Additional information spreads are full of extra fun facts, developing the topics through a range of nonfiction presentation styles such as diagrams and activities.
